1509010.name: Curiosaurios Club. Un viaje espacial
1509010.description:
Are you ready to tour the solar system with Sami and Codi? Will you be able to reach the end and bring the ship safely to Earth? "Curiosaurs Club. A space trip" is the game based on the homonymous book and consists of a casual video game, with a space theme, where two of young adventurers travel through space looking for their way back home. During their journey, they must overcome obstacles and discover things about the planets of the solar system.

Curiosaurios Club is a project that seeks to combine entertainment and education, fueling the curiosity of the youngest through picture books, tutorials and video games, thus creating a community of curiosities among our followers.
1509010.supported_languages:
西班牙语 - 西班牙*
